name: PiyoLog
0:
”Alexa, open PiyoLog.”
”Alexa, Open PiyoLog and record formula.”
”Alexa, Open PiyoLog and check recent sleep.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: piyo log
des:
This skill works with the Piyolog, a smartphone app.
To use this skill, you must have a PiyoLog account.

From Alexa, you can keep track of formula, pee, poop, sleep and etc.
You can also refer to recent records of food, potty and sleep.

This skill is not intended to record results measured by a doctor or health care provider, but is assumed to record results measured by the user of the skill.

To link your PiyoLog account, you must
Go to "Alexa Settings" in "Settings" of Piyolog, and get "Alexa Authentication Code".
Enter "Alexa Authentication Code" into the Alexa App to connect.
